10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"When he Prophet put the deceased in the grave" He said: And Abu Khalid (one of the narrators) said [one time]: "When he placed the deceased in the Lahd" - "He said one time: 'In the Name of Allah, by His command and upon the Millah of the Messenger of Allah.' and one time he said: 'In the Name of Allah, by His command and upon the Sunnah of the Messenger of Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا أُدْخِلَ الْمَيِّتُ الْقَبْرَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What Is Said When Putting The Deceased In The Grave
